greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(n) = A135141(A005940(n)).
comment: Even terms occur at the positions 2^n + 1 (A000051), in some order, and the odd terms everywhere else.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: A005940(n) = { my(p=2, t=1); n--; until(!n\=2, if((n%2), (t*=p), p=nextprime(p+1))); t }; \\ Modified from code of _M. F. Hasler_
xref: Related or similar permutations: A005940, A135141, A246363, A246367.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 26 2014
